channel.title: Major stuttering issues
channel.description: Tried installing this game multiple times now, and each time it's the same. In the menu i get constant audio stuttering and the game locks up for a second or 2 all the time. I also get this ingame. I have a Crossfire IV motherboard with a Nvidia HD onboard audio card aswell as Nvidia Geforce 570 GTX GFX card. I don't have any issues with any other game but this. It runs smoothly inbetween stutterings, so there must be some bug somewhere.

item.title: Major stuttering issues
item.dc:creator: exbagboy
item.description:
I had the same problem with Phenom II x6 and a 570GTX and what fixed it is
mat_queue_mode 0
it enables a different type of single thread processing.
Now it runs smooth.
mat_queue_mode 2 is for multi thread but it crashes so just type in 0.

item.title: Major stuttering issues
item.dc:creator: theblindhouse
item.description:
Mm, it may be because there is no multi-core rendering. When I play, I also get these stutters, as well as pretty annoying frame rate drops. I opened the game in windowed mode so I could look at Windows task manager to check my CPU usage, and sure enough, core 0 was just about maxed out leaving the others pretty much untouched. I hope there is at least some possibility of multi-core rendering in the future. Otherwise, this mod is phenomenal so far!
